name: Masterchef Ice Cream Edition
description:
Summer is comming... Who doesn't want to eat a tasty ice cream when it's hot outside?

The simulation game of The Masterchef Ice Cream Edition offers you the possibility to experience how to be the best chef of icecream in town. You have to make the best ice creams in order to satisfy the desires of yout customers. All you have to do is keep your customers happy.

Hurry up, a happy customer means a successful business!

Game Features :
- More than 5 types of Ice Cream
- Lots of ingredients (vanilla, chocolate, coconut ...)
- Eager customers
